programme.title: Berserk - S01E01 - The Black Swordsman
programme.desc: A lone swordsman named Guts battles monsters and reflects on his violent past.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E02 - The Band of the Hawk
programme.desc: Guts encounters the Band of the Hawk and crosses paths with Griffith.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E03 - First Battle
programme.desc: Guts proves his strength in battle, gaining the group's respect.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E04 - Hand of God
programme.desc: A strange vision confronts Guts with a glimpse of a god-like entity.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E05 - Sword Wind
programme.desc: The Band of the Hawk begins their rise as Griffith commands them.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E06 - Nosferatu Zodd
programme.desc: A fearsome enemy named Zodd reveals a terrifying secret.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E07 - Master of the Sword
programme.desc: Guts hones his skills and earns his place as a commander.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E08 - Conspiracy
programme.desc: The kingdom plots against Griffith and his growing influence.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E09 - Assassination
programme.desc: An attempt is made on Griffith's life as tensions rise.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E10 - Something Precious
programme.desc: Guts discovers the value of friendship during a quiet moment.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E11 - Battle
programme.desc: A fierce battle tests the Band of the Hawk's loyalty and skill.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E12 - Friend
programme.desc: Guts begins to question his purpose and path alongside Griffith.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E13 - Descent
programme.desc: The Band embarks on a dangerous mission deep into enemy territory.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E14 - Bonfire of Dreams
programme.desc: Guts dreams of a life beyond war and death.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E15 - Decisive Battle
programme.desc: Guts faces an overwhelming enemy in a pivotal clash.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E16 - The Conqueror
programme.desc: Griffith takes another step toward power through manipulation.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E17 - Moment of Glory
programme.desc: Guts shines in battle, but doubts plague his heart.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E18 - Tombstone of Flames
programme.desc: The Band suffers a major loss, shaking their morale.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E19 - Separation
programme.desc: Guts makes a life-changing decision to leave it all behind.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E20 - A Journey Begins in Flames
programme.desc: Guts begins his journey anew, unsure of what lies ahead.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E21 - The Day of Judgment
programme.desc: Dark omens mark a shift in fate for everyone involved.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E22 - The Great Massacre
programme.desc: The Band is hunted as Griffith’s ambitions fall apart.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E23 - The Flow of Time
programme.desc: Time slips away as the kingdom spirals into chaos.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E24 - The Eclipse
programme.desc: The Band's final stand leads to a horrifying revelation.

programme.title: Berserk - S01E25 - The Eternal Moment
programme.desc: Guts faces an unimaginable horror in the depths of despair.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E01 - The Arrival of Raditz
programme.desc: Goku's brother Raditz arrives on Earth and reveals Goku’s Saiyan heritage.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E02 - The World's Strongest Team
programme.desc: Goku and Piccolo team up to battle the powerful Raditz.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E03 - Gohan's Hidden Powers
programme.desc: Raditz discovers young Gohan’s incredible latent power.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E04 - Goku's Unusual Journey
programme.desc: Goku sacrifices himself and begins a journey in the Other World.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E05 - Gohan's Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Lost in the wilderness, Gohan begins to grow stronger.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E06 - Gohan Makes a Friend
programme.desc: Gohan befriends a lost dinosaur while surviving on his own.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Z - S01E07 - Trouble on Arlia
programme.desc: Vegeta and Nappa conquer a planet on their way to Earth.
